title: Update symbology-compose.yaml
description: Change symbology-api service image from symbology-api to symbology-collector. Keep container_name as symbology-api (Caddy routing). Add commented-out Go API service definition.

title: Scaffold Go API (api/)
description: Create minimal Go service structure under api/: cmd/api/main.go (HTTP server with /health), internal/ packages (config, database, handlers, middleware, router), Dockerfile, go.mod, justfile. main.go is a working server; all other files are placeholders with TODOs.

title: Restructure Repo into 3 Services
description: Reorganize the monorepo from src/ + ui/ into collector/ + api/ + ui/. See refactor-plan.md for full details.

title: Rename Python imports src → collector
description: Mass find-and-replace across all .py files under collector/: from src. → from collector., import src. → import collector. Also fix 2 bare imports: collector/database/utils.py and collector/tests/database/fixtures.py (from utils.config → from collector.utils.config). ~55 files affected.

title: Update collector/Dockerfile
description: Line 40: COPY . /app/src/ → COPY . /app/collector/. Line 55: CMD python -m src.api.main → CMD python -m collector.api.main.

title: Verify refactor
description: Run all verification checks: 1) just run api - Python API starts, 2) just run cli --help - CLI works, 3) just test api - tests pass, 4) cd api && go build ./cmd/api - Go scaffold compiles, 5) cd collector && nerdctl build -t symbology-collector:latest . - Docker build works.

title: Move src/ to collector/
description: git mv src collector. This is the foundation step that all other collector/ changes depend on.

title: Update collector/justfile
description: Update all src references to collector: uv run -m module paths, --cov targets, test paths, Docker image name symbology-api → symbology-collector.

title: Update collector/pyproject.toml
description: Update name to symbology-collector, fix testpaths, norecursedirs, and known-first-party references from src to collector.

title: Update root justfile
description: Update module paths (src.api.main → collector.api.main, src.cli.main → collector.cli.main), justfile path, -d flag, tar file paths, image names. Add commented-out Go API build.
